channel.title: I cant trade!

item.title: I cant trade!
item.dc:creator: @CoderStarter CoderStarter
item.description:
@CoderStarter wrote:

Hey there,
Well i cant trade on my server i am tryng to fix it for ages
so i have a 517 source
my players want to trade but when they trade a message comes
removed trading

public void tradePlayer(Player tp) { if (p.rights >= 0 && tp.rights < 3) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Removed trading."); return;

Read full topic
